Schema extracted at: 2025-11-12 19:53:02

## public.channels (BASE TABLE)
  - id: text NOT NULL
  - name: character varying(255.0) NULL
  - host: character varying(255.0) NULL
  - category: character varying(100.0) NULL

## public.experts (BASE TABLE)
  - id: bigint NOT NULL
  - name: text NOT NULL
  - website: text NULL
  - instagram: text NULL
  - youtube_channel_id: text NULL
  - created_at: timestamp with time zone NOT NULL DEFAULT now()

## public.processed_channels (BASE TABLE)
  - channel_id: text NOT NULL
  - process: text NOT NULL
  - created_at: timestamp with time zone NOT NULL DEFAULT now()

## public.processed_video (BASE TABLE)
  - video_id: text NOT NULL
  - process: text NOT NULL
  - updated_at_date: date NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_DATE
  - updated_at_timestamp: timestamp without time zone NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP

## public.pubmed_studies (BASE TABLE)
  - pmid: text NOT NULL
  - title: text NULL
  - authors: text NULL
  - publish_date: text NULL
  - pmcid: text NULL
  - abstract: text NULL
  - publication_types: text NULL
  - keywords: text NULL
  - search_query: text NULL
  - updated_at_timestamp: timestamp with time zone NULL DEFAULT now()
  - updated_at_date: date NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_DATE

## public.pubmed_studies_llm_identified (BASE TABLE)
  - pmid: text NOT NULL
  - title: text NULL
  - authors: text NULL
  - publish_date: text NULL
  - pmcid: text NULL
  - abstract: text NULL

## public.solutions (BASE TABLE)
  - id: bigint NOT NULL
  - category: character varying NULL
  - name: character varying NOT NULL
  - description: character varying NULL

## public.test (BASE TABLE)
  - id: integer NULL

## public.testing_results (BASE TABLE)
  - id: integer NOT NULL DEFAULT nextval('testing_results_id_seq'::regclass)
  - test_object: text NULL
  - result_value: double precision NULL
  - result_unit: text NULL
  - reference_value: double precision NULL
  - comments: text NULL
  - flag: text NULL
  - updated_at: timestamp without time zone NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
  - updated_at_date: date NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_DATE

## public.topics (BASE TABLE)
  - id: bigint NOT NULL
  - name: text NOT NULL

## public.v_channel_crawl (VIEW)
  - channel_id: text NULL
  - channel_id_guest: text NULL
  - count: bigint NULL

## public.v_channel_relations (VIEW)
  - channel_id: text NULL
  - video_id: text NULL
  - video_title: character varying(500.0) NULL
  - expert_id: bigint NULL
  - expert_name: text NULL
  - expert_relation: text NULL
  - youtube_channel_id: text NULL
  - instagram: text NULL
  - website: text NULL

## public.v_coverage_solution_pubmed (VIEW)
  - search_query: text NULL
  - is_solution: boolean NULL
  - num_pmid: bigint NULL

## public.v_coverage_videos (VIEW)
  - channel_id: text NULL
  - videos: bigint NULL
  - topic: bigint NULL
  - solution: bigint NULL
  - experts: bigint NULL
  - pubmeds: bigint NULL
  - descriptions: bigint NULL
  - subtitles: bigint NULL
  - summaries: bigint NULL

## public.v_video_combined (VIEW)
  - channel_id: text NULL
  - video_id: text NULL
  - video_title: character varying(500.0) NULL
  - video_description: text NULL
  - video_subtitles: text NULL
  - video_summary: text NULL
  - topic: text NULL
  - solution: character varying NULL
  - expert_name: text NULL
  - expert_relation: text NULL
  - pubmed_title: text NULL
  - video_description_video_id: text NULL
  - video_summary_video_id: text NULL
  - video_subtitles_video_id: text NULL

## public.v_video_experts (VIEW)
  - channel_id: text NULL
  - video_id: text NULL
  - title: character varying(500.0) NULL
  - expert_id: bigint NULL
  - expert_name: text NULL
  - expert_relation: text NULL
  - expert_youtube_channel_id: text NULL

## public.v_video_pubmed (VIEW)
  - channel_id: text NULL
  - video_id: text NULL
  - video_title: text NULL
  - pmid: text NULL
  - pubmed_title: text NULL
  - authors: text NULL
  - publish_date: text NULL
  - pmcid: text NULL
  - abstract: text NULL

## public.v_video_solutions (VIEW)
  - channel_id: text NULL
  - video_id: text NULL
  - title: character varying(500.0) NULL
  - solution: character varying NULL
  - value: boolean NULL

## public.v_video_topic (VIEW)
  - channel_id: text NULL
  - video_id: text NULL
  - title: character varying(500.0) NULL
  - topic_name: text NULL
  - value: boolean NULL

## public.v_video_topics (VIEW)
  - channel_id: text NULL
  - video_id: text NULL
  - title: character varying(500.0) NULL
  - topic: text NULL
  - value: boolean NULL

## public.video_description (BASE TABLE)
  - video_id: text NOT NULL
  - description: text NULL

## public.video_experts (BASE TABLE)
  - id: bigint NOT NULL
  - video_id: text NOT NULL
  - expert_id: bigint NOT NULL
  - relation: text NOT NULL
  - created_at: timestamp with time zone NOT NULL DEFAULT now()

## public.video_insight (BASE TABLE)
  - video_id: text NOT NULL
  - question_id: text NOT NULL
  - question: text NULL
  - answer: text NOT NULL

## public.video_pubmed (BASE TABLE)
  - video_id: text NOT NULL
  - pubmed_id: text NOT NULL

## public.video_research_studies (BASE TABLE)
  - video_id: text NOT NULL
  - details: text NULL

## public.video_solutions (BASE TABLE)
  - video_id: text NOT NULL
  - solution_id: bigint NOT NULL
  - value: boolean NULL

## public.video_subtitles (BASE TABLE)
  - video_id: text NOT NULL
  - subtitles: text NOT NULL

## public.video_summary (BASE TABLE)
  - video_id: text NOT NULL
  - summary: text NULL

## public.video_topics (BASE TABLE)
  - video_id: text NOT NULL
  - topic_id: bigint NOT NULL
  - value: boolean NULL

## public.videos (BASE TABLE)
  - id: text NOT NULL
  - title: character varying(500.0) NOT NULL
  - channel_id: text NOT NULL
  - published_at: timestamp with time zone NULL
  - duration: integer NULL
  - description: character varying NULL
  - url: character varying NULL
